metadata.title: CVE-2020-7739 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This affects all versions of package phantomjs-seo. It is possible for anattacker to craft a url that will be passed to a PhantomJS instanceallowing for an SSRF attack.

criterions.comment: phantomjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
